summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MSLK VTC application. Backend fully functional (100% success rate). Frontend core features working with minor driver login issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Login form accepts credentials but doesn't redirect to dashboard properly

integration_issues.issue: Driver login successful in backend but frontend redirect not working

design_issues.issue: Driver registration link not clearly visible on driver page

passed_tests: Admin login with default credentials (admin@mslk-vtc.fr / Admin123!)
Homepage loads with MSLK logo and noir/or theme
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix driver login redirect issue - backend authentication works but frontend doesn't redirect to dashboard after successful login. Check routing and token handling in driver login flow.
